attributes.action: Reverse the government's decision to give the go ahead for a puppy farm in Hull.
attributes.background:
The government has given the go ahead for a puppy farm in Hull, created with the purpose of providing beagle puppies to laboratories for animal testing!
This is unnecessary and cruel, painful and tortuous experiments will be conducted on these dogs. It needs to be stopped in it's tracks.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104454

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
